protocol.name: P-GSE23318-1
protocol.text: GCOS/MAS5 standard processing ID_REF =  VALUE = Signal ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M) DETECTION P-VALUE =

protocol.name: P-GSE23318-2
protocol.text: Controlled enviromental condition (22C) under fluorescent lights and a 16h/8h (day/light) photoperiod.

protocol.name: P-GSE23318-3
protocol.text: Total RNA was isolated from mature leaves using SV Total RNA Isolation system (Promega)

protocol.name: P-GSE23318-4
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 500 ng total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE23318-5
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Arabidopsis ATH1 array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.

protocol.name: P-GSE23318-6
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Hewlett-Packard GeneArray Scanner G2500A.
